name: Gimmighoul
description: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.
description_catalan: Aquest Pokémon va néixer dins d'un cofre del tresor fa aproximadament 1.500 anys. Xucla l'energia vital dels malfactors que intenten robar el tresor.
